1.text: Place 6 eggs in a saucepan or other pot with cool water.

2.text: Bring the water to a boil with a lid on the pan.

3.text: Turn the burner off and let the eggs sit in the pan for 7 minutes.

4.text: Cool the eggs in an ice bath for 3 to 5 minutes.

5.text: Crack each of the hard-boiled eggs.

6.text: Put the eggs and mayo in a medium-sized bowl.

7.text: Mash the eggs and mayonnaise with a fork.

9.text: Serve the salad plain or as a sandwich.

11.text: Peel and cut up the eggs.

12.text: Mix the mayonnaise, yogurt, and red wine vinegar in a small bowl.

13.text: Combine the eggs, bacon, blue cheese, avocado, and tomatoes in a large bowl.

14.text: Fold the dressing into the salad.

15.text: Garnish the salad with chives and any other additional toppings.
